Package processing.sound

Class PinkNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.sound.PinkNoise

  • public class PinkNoise
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a pink noise generator. Pink Noise has a decrease of 3dB per octave.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void add​(float add)
      Offset the output of this generator by given value

      Start the generator

      Set multiple parameters at once.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set​(float amp,
                float add,
                float pos)
        Set multiple parameters at once.
        Parameters:
        amp - Amplitude value between 0.0 and 1.0
        add - Offset the generator by a given value
        pos - Pan the generator in stereo panorama. Allowed values are between -1.0 and 1.0.

      • add

        public final void add​(float add)
        Offset the output of this generator by given value
        Parameters:
        add - A value for offsetting the audio signal.

      • amp

        public void amp​(float amp)
        Changes the amplitude/volume of this sound.
        Parameters:
        amp - A float value between 0.0 (complete silence) and 1.0 (full volume) controlling the amplitude/volume of this sound.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying​()
        Check if this sound object is currently playing.
        Returns:
        `true` if this sound object is currently playing, `false` if it is not.

      • pan

        public final void pan​(float pos)
        Move the sound in a stereo panorama.
        Parameters:
        pos - The panoramic position of this sound unit as a float from -1.0 (left) to 1.0 (right).

      • play

        public void play​()
        Start the generator

      • stop

        public void stop​()
        Stop the generator
